channel.title: Changing hotkeys
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone could tell me how to change the hotkeys like f1 opens attack options atm but I want it to open inventory. Like the real runescape ones are.
This is for 508/525 btw.
I found keypressed in class123 but it didn't have anything about hotkeys. I found many tuorials for 317s but it doesn't work for 508/525 clients because it's in a different file.
Any help is appreciated. Thanks :)
